The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 September is 347,842 (618 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 18 September, there were 20,899 new confirmed cases (37.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 September, there were 19,480 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (1419 extra cases).
